title: Remembering Lena Fitting Kourkoutis and her Remarkable Achievements
content: Lena Fitting Kourkoutis was a great scientist, a loving mom, wife and daughter, and an exceptional human being. Her passing so much before her time has robbed us of the many important scientific advances, the incisive teaching and the sensitive mentoring that she seemed destined to do. Very sadly, it has also robbed two young kids of a loving and supportive mom who would do everything possible for them. But she remains alive in our hearts and minds, even more because her departure was so untimely.
